entry.title: HorizonTech - Falcon 2 Tank
entry.summary:
Vendor: VanGo Vapes
Type: Tank
Price: 39.99

Horizon Falcon 2 Tank Atomizer in CRC version is a new version of the HorizonTech Falcon series. Horizon Falcon 2 Sub Ohm Tank features 5.2ml e-juice capacity to meet your vaping needs. It is made of Pyrex glass and stainless steel material that makes your device durable.

The HorizonTech Falcon II replacement tank adopts adjustable airflow and resin drip tip that will bring you purest and fantastic vaping flavor. What's more, it features a new fan-shaped coil, the tapered structure forms a bottom-up vapor compression path, which makes the flavor denser and the vapor more smooth. HorizonTech Falcon II sub-ohm tank optimizes the core change method: the former core is threaded and must be replaced after the smoke oil is completely used up, now simply unscrew the base and pull the atomization core directly without smudging the hand.

Parameters

  • Excircle Diameter: 25mm

  • Wattage: 70-75W
  • Fill: Top-filling system

entry.title: Uwell Crown V Replacement Drip Tip
Mortal Koils Premade Coils
entry.summary:
Vendor: VanGo Vapes
Type: Coil
Price: 14.99

Pick up your pack of Mortal Koils for any rebuildable device right over here! Measuring at a width of 3mm, they fit in most RDAs, RDTAs, RTAs, & RBA decks. On top of that, they fit in most sub-ohm tank decks provided they have the RBA adapter and each purchase comes with a few coils so you'll be equipped for a while!

  • Framed Staples: Good for hot vapes and offer huge flavour.
  • Aliens are a good all around coil. They give off a crackling sound, and have better flavour and clouds.
  • Mohawks: Great flavour and clouds. As they can be a bit tricky to install, they are more appropriate for experienced installers looking for attractive coils.

The are handmade out of Nichrome 80 (nickel chromium) which has been used for voltage and wattage control for many years. They run at 0.25 ohms and so will safely operate in many sub-ohm devices, even at higher wattages.

Both Small and large orders are hand built and made to perfection with the cleanest wire, and then put in to a UV disinfection box after packaging to ensure the cleanest product we can deliever to you for your safety.

It is advised to have a knowledge on Ohm's Law as well as battery safety before operating any variable vaping device.

entry.title: Airistech Airis 8 Multi-Use Vaporizer
entry.summary:
Vendor: VanGo Vapes
Type: Device
Price: 59.99

The Airis 8 is a two function vape that can be used a wax or dab pen. 

How to use the Airis 8 as a Dab pen:

Simply remove the dab mouthpiece, and heat up the touch coil. To heat the coil up you just need to hold down the power button. Once the coil has properly heated you can touch it to the concentrate you are using to dab. It is important that you inhale on the dab vape pen mouthpiece as you touch the coil to the concentrate. Make sure that you do not touch the hot coil with your fingers before or after dabbing.

How to use the Airis 8 as a was pen:

To use the Airis 8 as a portable wax pen you need to use the enclosed wax coil, not the exposed dab coil. Once the correct coil has been screwed into the body of the vape you need to load the coil with concentrate. To do this just unscrew the top cap part of the coil and load wax. Make sure to not overload the coil. Replace the mouthpiece and then turn it on. You must hold the power button down to vaporize the wax.

Packaging:

  • The battery or body portion of the vaporizer.
  • Two coils, one for dabbing and one for vaping.
  • A removable mouthpiece.
  • A micro-USB charging cable.
  • A metal dab tool.
  • A cleaning brush.
  • The user manual
